3. Barplot

Source: vignettes/C_barplots.Rmd
C_barplots.Rmd
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
    library("plotlyutils")
    library("ggplot2")
    library("plotly")
})

g <- ggplot(mpg, aes(class))
g <- g + geom_bar(aes(fill=drv))
print(g)

ggplotly(g)

Developed by Alan O’Callaghan.
